name: Jackalope Escape
description:
I tasked myself with making a game in a day, this was the result, all the sprites, music, sound effects, animations, the characters attacking and so on were all done in the span of 9 hours.

Controls:
Mouse moves the hand in the main menu.
Space to jump.
Arrow Keys to walk.

In this game you'll be playing as the green jackalope, escaping from some type of horrible nightmare location.

While i made it in a rush i also toned it back from the i wanna be the guy level of rage inducing, now it's a bit more of a lite version where as long as you understand the machincs you should be able to make it to the end and that final victory walk.

We also have a discord for chatting and general use purposes.
The Green Jackalope Discord
